New Records: Josh Giddey recorded 14 points, 12 rebounds, and six assists in the game against the Charlotte Hornets
Key Match Events: Giddey made two clutch free throws with 14 seconds remaining to secure the win
The Bulls outlasted Charlotte in overtime with a final score of 115-108
Pre-Game Insights: The Bulls aimed to finish the season strong and build momentum for 2025
Chicago had been inconsistent but looked to end the year on a positive note
Post-Match Reflections: The Bulls ended the season with a two-game winning streak
Giddey's performance and clutch plays were pivotal in the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls are primed for the Play-In Tournament
Giddey's future with the team and contract considerations were discussed
